title: Nice smooth condensed font
content:
Can anyone identify this font from a magazine article.  
Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725020605im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CANDY%20FONT_4210.jpg)
author: elmastrich

comments.content:
It looks like **[Gravur Condensed Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725020605/http:/lineto.com/1.0/content_1.html)** by Cornel Windlin, Gilles Gavillet [2001] - probably a bit emboldened.

**[Terminal Dosis (Book)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725020605/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Google-Web-Fonts&ffam=Terminal%20Dosis%20-%20Book&fid=ff4dfb98a7fdac1bcba237f587f1904e&fsize=60&text=CANDY&wrap=2)** by Pablo Impallari, Edgar Tolentino, Igino Marini [2011] could be a good substitute - available on Google Web Fonts
Fivos' suggestion of Gravur Condensed is a good call so part of giving more information about your sample (magazine name), it'd be hard to positively identify it.
